channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Life is cheap this Christmas
item.description: You can restore a starving infant to health for about $40.

item.title: One of the most important ‘Magnificent Seven’ members is rumbling to life. Here’s what that means for tech and the S&P 500.
item.description: Nvidia shares have been on a run lately and strategist Mark Newton says that has bigger meaning for the stock market in general.

item.title: Tim Cook did something he hasn’t done before — buy Nike’s stock on the open market
item.description: Apple CEO and Nike board member Tim Cook spent nearly $3 million to buy Nike’s stock after the latest selloff, roughly doubling his stake in the compa...

item.title: America’s food market is rigged. Look who’s getting rich while many of us struggle with grocery bills
item.description: Powerful “Big Ag” — not small farmers and ranchers or even tariffs — is the root cause of the food-affordability crisis.

item.title: Precious metals have been on a heated pre-holiday run. Why this strategist is calling that ‘unhinged.’
item.description: The run-up to the year-end holiday period has come with big gains for precious metals, but one UBS strategist says investor beware.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...
